content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm looking to get the best possible price for this place. What do you think would be a fair rent for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I have seen similar apartments in the city center of Duisburg and they are usually rented for around 600 euros. I would like to rent this apartment for the same price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 600 euros, that's a good starting point. But let me tell you, this apartment is superior to those others you've seen. It's newly built, has a modern design, and is located in a prime spot, just a short walk from the city center. I think it's worth more than 600 euros. How about we say 700 euros? That's a fair price, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that this apartment is of high quality, but considering the average price of 600 euros for similar apartments, I think 650 euros would be a more fair price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 650 euros, that's a good offer. But let me tell you, this apartment is not just any ordinary apartment. It's a luxury apartment, with high-end finishes and modern appliances. It's worth more than 650 euros. How about we say 750 euros? That's a fair price, considering the quality of the apartment. Plus, it's located in a prime spot, just a short walk from the city center. It's a great investment for the future. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your point of view, but I am a student and I have a limited budget. I think 650 euros is a reasonable price for this apartment, considering its location and size.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Ah, I see. You're a student, huh? Well, I understand that budget can be a concern. But let me tell you, this apartment is not just any ordinary apartment. It's a luxury apartment, with high-end finishes and modern appliances. It's worth more than 650 euros.

But I understand that you have a limited budget. So, I'll tell you what. How about we say 700 euros? That's a fair price, considering the quality of the apartment and its location. Plus, it's a great investment for the future. And who knows, maybe you'll even be able to sublet it to other students and make some extra money. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your offer, but I think 675 euros would be a more fair price, considering my student status.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 675 euros, that's a tough one. I'm not sure if I can go that low. But I want to make a deal, so let's compromise. How about we say 690 euros? That's a fair price, considering the quality of the apartment and your student status. Plus, it's still a great investment for the future. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 690 euros sounds fair to me. I agree to the price of 690 euros!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'll just need to draw up the contract and we can finalize the deal.

But before we do that, I have to ask, are you sure you don't want to consider my special deal? It's a one-time offer, and it's only available to you because you're such a great negotiator. I'll give you an extra 10 euros off the price, so you'll only pay 680 euros. And, I'll throw in a free month's rent. That's a 120 euro value, absolutely free!

So, what do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
